input_args.passage: 'Paul Molitor | Paul Leo Molitor (born August 22, 1956), nicknamed "Molly" and "the Ignitor", is an American former professional baseball player and manager.'
input_args.claim: 'Since the sources do not provide any other person known as "the Ignitor" in 1998, we can reasonably deduce that Paul Molitor is "the Ignitor" in this context.'
